suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider repositioning the pillow and cup to create a more balanced composition. The pillow could be placed slightly to the side or behind the dog to add depth, while the cup could be moved closer to the foreground or to the side to avoid cluttering the central focus. This will help enhance the overall flow and maintain the viewer's attention on the dog.
